Title: High & Low: G-Sword (Special)
Description: [HiGH&LOW THE LAND, ' was a limited time theme park section at Yomiuri Land. The event space recreated scenery from ', High & Low: G-Sword, ' where guests could buy goods, ride coasters, and watch live performers reenact scenes. Starting in July, five brand-new shorts were to be shown at the theme park each day of the week. They ran all the way till the section closed on September 10, 2017.']
